channel.title: Chen Wei on Artangled
channel.description: Recent content in Chen Wei on Artangled

item.title: Witness | Pilar Corrias
item.description: China’s home to one in four people, and many of the world’s fastest growing cities. Four different Chinese artists’ responses to the city are currently on show at Pilar Corrias. Chen Wei, now resident in Beijing, stood out to me. One lovely photo in particular, New Buildings, (2016), a rainy window, dappled with condensation, lit up with multiple colours, suggesting windows and signage in a street behind. This weirdly wistful image is a bit of a trick, though.
